title: Musk Nazi Salute at Trump Inauguration
summary: At Trump inauguration rally, Elon Musk placed hand on heart then extended arm outward with palm down - twice. Widely condemned in Germany where such gestures are illegal. Neo-Nazi groups celebrated it. Rep. Nadler: 'I never imagined we would see... what appears to be a Heil Hitler salute... behind the Presidential seal.'
keyFacts: Placed hand on heart then extended arm outward with palm down - twice
Said: 'My heart goes out to you. It is thanks to you that the future of civilization is assured'
Widely condemned in Germany where such gestures are illegal
Neo-Nazi and white supremacist groups celebrated it as Nazi salute
Rep. Jerry Nadler: 'I never imagined we would see... what appears to be a Heil Hitler salute... behind the Presidential seal'
Musk dismissed as 'dirty tricks,' then posted Nazi-themed puns and jokes on X
Steve Bannon replicated salute at CPAC to applause
Multiple European political parties demanded Musk be banned from their countries
Holocaust memorial Yad Vashem chair condemned Musk's comments that there is 'too much focus on past guilt'
